actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to provide that persons may qualify for nonregular retirement pay before age 60 if totally and permanently disabled.

summary.text: Provides that military personnel and veterans may qualify for nonregular retirement pay before age 60 if totally and permanently disabled.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to provide that persons may qualify for nonregular retirement pay before age 60 if totally and permanently disabled.
